attributes.action: Take down the petition to have the government reverse mandatory masks in shops
attributes.background: if the petition which already has over 1000 signatures gets sent through I want them to rip it up and move on as its signed by selfish ignorant people that don't care about staff or customer safety

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about removing other petitions. If you don't want the Government to ease the requirements regarding wearing face coverings in shops you could start a petition requesting this.

Deciding whether to remove restrictions relating to face coverings is a matter for the Government.
